Package algorithms.imageProcessing.matching

Class CorrespondenceMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.matching.CorrespondenceMaker
  • public class CorrespondenceMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    a class to use harris corners filtered to local maxima and ORB descriptors to find matching keypoints between 2 images. Not that the images may need pre-processing so that at least 50% of the potential features are common to both. Texture matching with HOGs may return better results. Also note that alternative means may be necessary for extremely repetetive patterns.
